TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PriorityBindingExpression extends System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase

Docs.summary: Contains instance information about a single instance of a .

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding> is a single run-time instance of a PriorityBindingExpression. Therefore, it describes a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> objects that are attached to a single binding target property, which receives its value from the first <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> object in the collection that returns a value successfully. For information about binding expressions, see the Binding and BindingExpression section in the [Data Binding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The binding engine determines which of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> objects is the <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression.ActiveBindingExpression%2A> based on priority. For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>.

Docs.value: The active object; or , if no object is active. Although the return type is , the returned object is only a object because the class currently supports only objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The binding engine determines which of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> objects is the ActiveBindingExpression based on priority. For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>.

Docs.summary: Gets the collection of objects inside this instance of .
Docs.value: A read-only collection of the objects. Although the return type is a collection of objects, the returned collection only contains objects because the class currently supports only objects.

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the parent binding has a failed validation rule.
Docs.value: if the parent binding has a failed validation rule; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Gets the object from which this is created.
Docs.value: The object from which this is created.

Docs.summary: Updates the source on the active binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression.UpdateSource%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression.ActiveBindingExpression%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void UpdateTarget() cil managed

Docs.summary: Updates the target on the active binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression.UpdateTarget%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression.ActiveBindingExpression%2A> property.
